name: sugar beet pulp to generic market for energy feed | protein feed, 100% crude | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8966/documentation

This is a linking activity that converts sugar beet pulp into gross energy for the feed market and protein, 100% crude for the feed market. ;The naming of the dataset is based on the feed nomenclature system of the National Research Council (USA).  Products with less than 20 percent of protein are classified as energy feeds. Products with more than 20 percent of protein are classified as protein feeds.

The activity starts with the reception of sugar beet pulp

The activity ends with the conversion of sugar beet pulp into gross energy and crude protein
category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/107:Manufacture of other food products/1072:Manufacture of sugar

processDocumentation.samplingDescription: inventory based on gross energy and protein composition of raw material. Data obtained from Agroscope database of feedstuff compositions.

exchanges.description: Calculated based on crude protein content of sugar beet pulp (0.09kg/kg dry mass). The dry mass of the reference product is 0.25kg/kg.

flow.name: protein feed, 100% crude

flow.name: sugar beet pulp
